snippet: The exchange of fire across the northern border in the state of Jammu and Kashmir left at least two people dead and at least one other wounded, officials said Saturday.
abstract: Two people are reportedly killed in gunfire exchange between Indian and Pakistani guards along disputed border of Jammu and Kashmir.

byline.contributor: Salman Masood contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The exchange of fire across the northern border in the state of Jammu and Kashmir left at least two people dead and at least one other wounded, officials said Saturday.

headline.main: Indian and Pakistani Guards Trade Fire on Disputed Border
headline.print_headline: Indian and Pakistani Guards Trade Fire on Disputed Border
